com.knowledgeplayers.grar.structure.Game

type
interface
implements
native.events.IEventDispatcher

Instance Variables

inventory(default,null) : Array<String>

mode : com.knowledgeplayers.grar.tracking.Mode

state : String

title : String

Instance Methods

addLanguage(value : String, path : String, flagIconPath : String) : Void

parameters
value : name of the language
path : path to the localisation folder
flagIconPath : path to the flag for this language
Add a language to the game

addPart(partIndex : Int, part : com.knowledgeplayers.grar.structure.part.Part) : Void

parameters
partIndex : position of the part in the game
part : the part to add
Add a part to the game at partIndex

getAllParts() : Array<com.knowledgeplayers.grar.structure.part.Part>

returns
an array of parts
Return all the parts of the game

getLoadingCompletion() : Float

returns
a float between 0 (nothing loaded) and 1 (everything's loaded)
Get the state of loading of the game

init(xml : Xml) : Void

parameters
xml : the structure
Initialize the game with a xml structure

initTracking(?mode : com.knowledgeplayers.grar.tracking.Mode) : Void

parameters
mode : tracking mode (SCORM/AICC)
Start the tracking

next() : Null<com.knowledgeplayers.grar.structure.part.Part>

returns
the next part or null if the game is over
Return the next part of the game

start(?partId : Int) : Null<com.knowledgeplayers.grar.structure.part.Part>

parameters
partId : the ID of the part to start.
returns
the part with id partId or null if this part doesn't exist
Start the game

toString() : String

returns
a string-based representation of the game
